person.persName: John Littlefield (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer and pvt 4h KY Mtd Inf (U.S.A.))

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Caldwell County, Kentucky, native. Son of Nelly Littlefield. Married to Emily Ann Franklin Littlefield in Montgomery County, Tennessee, on April 6, 1858. Father of Almeda Littlefield and R. E. Littlefield. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1863. Served in the 4th Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as private from June 14, 1864, to August 17, 1865.
